adds.text: 禁止向ETH地址充值除ETH之外的资产，否则将不可找回
禁止向ETH地址充值ERC20的USDT，否则将不可找回
使用ETH地址充值需要30个网络确认才能到账
目前不支持使用智能合约或区块奖励(Coinbase)的转账充值，智能合约或区块奖励的转账将不会上账，请您谅解
Send only ETH to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit
Coins will be deposited immediately after 30 network confirmations
Deposits of smart contracts or block awards (Coinbase) are not supported for now and will not be credited. Please understand
